descriptionHtml:
[size=5pt]Categorized Favorites Menu Universal[/size]

Is my attempt to optimize the Categorized Favorites Menu so It works well with all player types.
Whether your a Dunmer mage practicing Alteration or a warhammer wielding Orc 
This will most definitely suit your character. (Cant forget about stealthy characters either!)
While playing I found that lots of my vanilla favorites (bows,arrows,and swords) would show up in the misc section, and nearly all my mod armors and weapons would be unlisted as well.
so I decided to fix the problem and In addition add more features with every update.

Here it is!

[size=5pt]Features:[/size]
Recolored menu style (Regular and purple).
Added several sub-menus and redid most of the others.
Better sorting for all types of characters.
Revamped all the menus to recognize DLC potions,weapons,spells,foods.
Added more mod support.

[size=5pt]Support:[/size]

• Frostfall
• Immersive Armors
• Immersive Weapons
• SkyRE
• Midas Magic
• Apocalypse Spell Package
• Realistic Needs And Diseases
• Wrath of Nature - The Path of the Druid (WIP)
• Cloaks of Skyrim + WIC
• Vampiric Thirst
• Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
• Bucklers
• T3nd0s Skyrim Redone
• And more + Adding more mod support in the future! (Need feedback for which mods)

This also has full support for all Skyrim DLC (Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn)

[size=5pt]Requirements:[/size]
SKSE (Can be used without but you wont be able to save your screen positioning)
Categorized Favorites Menu

[size=5pt]Installation:[/size]

Download with NMM

[size=3pt]Manual Installation:[/size]

Copy the favoritesmenu.cfg file into your Skyrim data folder/Interface and replaced when asked.


[size=5pt]Update Log:[/size]

[size=3pt]V1.4[/size]
Added NMM support
Added full support for Bucklers
Added full support for Bandoilers
Fixed various menu problems

[size=3pt]V1.3[/size]
Added full support for Cloaks of Skyrim + WIC Cloaks
Added full support for Midas Magic
Added full support for Apocalypse Spell Package

[size=3pt]V1.2[/size]
Added full support for Vampiric Thirst
Added sub-menu for clothing under apparel
Added sub-menu for jewelry under apparel
Added sub-menu for tools (woodcutters axe,pickaxe) under weapons

[size=3pt]V1.0[/size]
Added partial support for Cloaks of Skyrim
Added partial support for Midas Magic
Added partial support for Apocalypse Spell Package
Added full support for Realistic Needs And Diseases

[size=5pt]Menu Styles:[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/cJfpVZQ.jpg[/img]
[size=3pt]Classic Edition[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/CVXwmqu.jpg[/img]
[size=3pt]Moonlight Seance Edition[/size]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/HTizKu8.jpg[/img]
[size=3pt]Bloodlust Edition[/size]


[size=4pt]Special thanks to:[/size]
Favmenumodder for creating CFM
author: MajesticDarkness
